synopsis.text:
When times are tough and hope seems to dwindle, a magical savior named Mary Bell emerges from the enchanting realm of 'Flower Magic World'. With the appearance of a sweet five-year-old girl, Mary Bell is a fairy of flowers who steps into the human world to lend a helping hand.

Ken and Yuuri, two young siblings, witness their parents' struggle to keep their flower shop thriving amidst hard times. As if by magic, Mary Bell appears before them, ready to turn their fortunes around. With her trusty companions, Ribbon the dog and Tambourine, her magical helper, Mary Bell embarks on a mission to restore the flower shop's success.

In the vibrant city of SunnyBell, Mary Bell, Ken, and Yuuri engage in a series of magical adventures, using their positivity and enchanting powers to aid both plants and people alike. From learning life skills to rejuvenating a withered tree, there's never a dull moment when Mary Bell is around.

As the city's secret superheroine, Mary Bell uses her magical tambourine to transform and save the day, ensuring that the residents of SunnyBell can always count on a touch of magic to brighten their lives. Join Mary Bell, Ken, and Yuuri in their heartwarming and enchanting journey, filled with magic, friendship, and personal growth.
